name: Pyrolusite's Resource Packs
tagline: Repository containing everything related to my resource packs for Minecraft and various mods.
body:
# Introduction
Welcome. You can find my modest contributions to Minecraft and its mods here.

These resource packs are intended to be modular, which means you can add them to your resource pack list ingame and they will only "overwrite" what's needed - provided you place them on top of your other resource packs, ofc.

I'm still using Mediafire for my download links, but I might host my resource packs on this repository soon.

# Modern Minimalism
### Download
[Modern Minimalism v0.12 - Minecraft 1.7.10/1.8 (Mediafire)](http://www.mediafire.com/download/hcmzxzt1kdc86zk/modern_minimalism_v0_12.zip)

### Description
Some time ago, I worked on a [GUI](http://i.imgur.com/7laJ2Mn.png) for a GT addon called Modular Powersuits. What it does is self-explanatory, however, I liked what I came up with, so I decided to do the same for the default Minecraft HUD, progressively adding mod support like AppleCore, EnviroMine...

### Screenshots
Imgur album [here](http://imgur.com/a/5POfn).


# Minimalist Technology (GT6 + IC2)
### Download
[Minimalist Technology v0.6 - GT6/IC2 (Mediafire)](http://www.mediafire.com/download/ddp7qx2bbxiga9a/minimalist_technology_v0_6.zip)
[Minimalist Technology NEI module](http://www.mediafire.com/download/44cq1bi24pkc9af/mt_nei_module.zip)

### Description
This is my alternative to GT6 and IC2 Experimental textures.
Initially, I couldn't stand GT5's textures when its alpha came out, so I decided to make my own resource pack for GT5. Since then, I decided to do it with IC2 Experimental as well, but in separate packs (Pyrolusite's GregTech Alternate Textures - PGTAT - and Pyrolusite's IC2 Alternate Textures - PICAT.) Starting to rework both of them since GT6, I decided to merge them into a single resource pack.

My textures are inspired from the original ones, while adding my own touch. I tend to use a limited color palette and stick with it for a lot of my work, hence why I consider it "minimalist".

### Screenshots
Imgur album [here](http://imgur.com/a/JJkS2).
NEI module [here](http://i.imgur.com/l7uYaqf.png).


# Minimalist Technology Legacy (GT5U + IC2)
### Download
[Minimalist Technology Legacy v0.7 - GT5U/IC2 (Mediafire)](http://www.mediafire.com/download/2m9v1nny2g48iv6/minimalist_technology_legacy_v0_7.zip)
[Minimalist Technology NEI module](http://www.mediafire.com/download/44cq1bi24pkc9af/mt_nei_module.zip)

### Description
Minimalist Technology, but for the GT5 unnoficial continuation - GT5U - maintained by BloodyAsp.
Compatible with GT5E as well.

### Screenshots
Imgur album [here](http://imgur.com/a/T8tVf).
NEI module [here](http://i.imgur.com/l7uYaqf.png).
